title: “The reality is when you look at the Biden plan, it reads an awful lot like what President Trump and I and our task force have been doing every step of the way.” truepants-fire”
selftext:
Jesus this is just beyond all words. The Republican Jesus follower lies just as bad as Trump. 

https://www.politifact.com/factchecks/2020/oct/13/mike-pence/pence-said-biden-copied-trumps-pandemic-response-p/
